00006  * Shift all the elements in a vector to the left and add the new one at the end of this vector
00007 */ 
00008 void MyVector::shiftLeft(Vector & newElement){
00009 
00010         for (unsigned int i=0; i < this->size(); i++)   
00011         {
00012                 this->insert_element(i, (*this)(i+1));
00013         }
00014         
00015         this->insert_element(this->size(), newElement);
00016 }
